1.text: Grab a large enough tupperware container that has a lid, or a drink shaker.

2.text: Scoop your ice cream into your container.
2.vid: /4/44/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 2.360p.mp4

3.vid: /a/a9/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 3.360p.mp4

4.vid: /6/62/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Mash and stir with a spoon.
5.vid: /0/0c/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Put the lid on your jar or shaker and shake it up.
6.vid: /8/86/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 6.360p.mp4

7.vid: /6/69/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 7.360p.mp4

9.vid: /8/84/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Add milk to the ice cream in your bowl.
10.vid: /5/5c/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 10.360p.mp4

11.vid: /c/c3/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 11.360p.mp4

12.text: See if it's the right texture.
12.vid: /4/4b/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Pour your milkshake into a glass.
13.vid: /4/46/Make a Milkshake Without a Blender Step 13.360p.mp4
